subject: Basketball
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Jeff Adrien, a junior forward, had a career-high 27 points and pulled down 11 rebounds as No. 15 Connecticut defeated Rutgers, 79-61.
snippet: Jeff Adrien, a junior forward, had a career-high 27 points and pulled down 11 rebounds as No. 15 Connecticut defeated Rutgers, 79-61.
